I am an Emergency Department nurse and PhD student in Nursing and Health Policy at Columbia University. My dissertation focus is on reducing ED utilization in high-need high-cost patients through innovative care delivery models led by Nurse Practitioners at the primary care setting. 





You can learn a bit about me [here](About.html), check out my recent
[publications](Publications.html), or follow me on [twitter](https://twitter.com/abilazarian) and
[linkedin](https://www.linkedin.com/in/ani-bilazarian-844a3780/)
